imdb.plot: One day, Miu Takigawa suddenly receives a letter notifying her that she has been chosen as a member of a brand-new project. Half in disbelief, she heads over to the location stated on the letter. There, she finds seven other girls...

episodes.title: Chasing Our Dreams
episodes.plot: 22/7 has disbanded based on the orders from the Wall. The GIP office has shut down and all the members have gone their separate ways. Miu never wanted to become an idol in the first place, but she can't understand why the group had to break up. Nicole had the strongest ambition to become an idol and is furious about this outcome. Unlike her current personality, Nicole was very introverted as a child. Her life changed when she met a girl who transferred to her class at school.
